rows.label: qev092902_MSG0010
rows.name:
Oops, that's right.
I haven't introduced myself yet, have I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0020
rows.name:
I'm Neil Nail.
You can just call me Neil.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0030
rows.name:
By the way, is this the first time
you've seen a Qlurian?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_JNK0040
rows.name: First Time

rows.label: qev092902_SEL0050
rows.name: Nod that it's the first time.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0060
rows.name: Hmm. Just as I thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0070
rows.name: Not Really

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0080
rows.name: Say you've seen one before.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0090
rows.name:
Really? That's rare.
I'd love for you to introduce me sometime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0100
rows.name:
Because Qlurians
rarely leave their home planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0105
rows.name: Even I rarely meet others out here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0110
rows.name: So, just to confirm[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0120
rows.name:
You BLADEs are a private military organization,
and you also take on jobs that require armed force[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0130
rows.name: Am I right so far?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0140
rows.name:
Okay, good!
That's exactly the sort of thing I'm looking for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0150
rows.name: But for activities in dangerous zones...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0160
rows.name:
Apparently it requires tiresome procedures and
permission from the higher-ups[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0170
rows.name:
Especially when an alien like me is involved.
You know - potential diplomatic incidents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0180
rows.name:
Just when I was starting to give up, thinking,
"Guess I'll have to do it alone..."[ST:wide ]—
you showed up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0190
rows.name:
From what I've seen, it looks like there are some BLADEs
who accept requests at their own discretion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0200
rows.name: So that kind of thing is allowed, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_JNK0210
rows.name: Agree Immediately

rows.label: qev092902_SEL0220
rows.name: Nod yes, accepting the request.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0230
rows.name:
You decided immediately, even though
I haven't even told you the details of the request yet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0240
rows.name: You've got some guts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0250
rows.name: Hear Details First

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0260
rows.name:
Reserve judgment until you've
heard all the details.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0270
rows.name:
Right, right. That makes sense.
Okay then, I'll explain step by step.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0280
rows.name:
I want to investigate that giant
ring-shaped structure[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0290
rows.name:
In the area called the Valley of Oblivion,
Personally.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0310
rows.name:
I research what you would call
"archaeology."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0320
rows.name: My subjects are ruins of alien civilizations and written records.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0325
rows.name: You could call it "cosmoarchaeology," I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0330
rows.name:
So, if that ring structure
is anything like the thing I think it is,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0335
rows.name: it might be a rather troublesome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0340
rows.name:
If possible, I want to clarify its true nature soon.
To do that, I need to do an on-site investigation, but[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0350
rows.name:
See, around that area,
dangerous native creatures are swarming all over, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0360
rows.name:
I need you to protect me from the native creatures[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]
so that I can focus on the investigation.

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0370
rows.name:
That's what I want to ask for.
What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0380
rows.name: Of course, if needed, I'll fight too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0390
rows.name:
Despite appearances, I've traveled around ruins in various star systems,
so I've gained my fair share of experience.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0400
rows.name: Alright then[ST:wide ]— Enough chatting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092902_MSG0410
rows.name:
Let's head for the giant ring! Let's go!
Nice working with you again.[ST:wait ]
